metadata.title: CVE-2021-4320 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Blink in Google Chrome prior to 92.0.4515.107 allowed aremote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to performarbitrary read/write via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity:High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
